entry.source: 〉 One of Mother Harlot's followers{F801}interrupts the battle...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 One of Mother Harlot's followers{F801}interrupts the battle...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Follower\0{F87A,53}Mother! Please leave this to us.{F801}{F802}You have only just materialized.{F801}For your own safety, please{F801}stay back.{F801}{F802}Now please, come this way!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Follower\0{F87A,53}Mother! Please leave this to us.{F801}{F802}You have only just materialized.{F801}For your own safety, please{F801}stay back.{F801}{F802}Now please, come this way!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Follower\0{F87A,53}Rise! Gods of Babylon.{F801}{F802}You may have the honor of protecting{F801}the mother goddess!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Follower\0{F87A,53}Rise! Gods of Babylon.{F801}{F802}You may have the honor of protecting{F801}the mother goddess!{F801}
